animeDescription: Yayoi is a sexually frustrated housewife with a workaholic husband whom she loves, but lately hasn't been paying her the attention she needs. She begins to fantasize frequently. A coincidental encounter with a nice young man from the neighborhood who has a crush on her is too much for her self-control.
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Junai Mellow', 'Other: Soushi Souai: Junai Mellow yori']
